name: Eye Balls
description:
This is just some shitty game I made to experiment and understand the physics of RigidBody2Ds, shaders, and the pause property.

Nothing special with this shit game, really.

Press "G" to PAUSE and get the glitch effect.
Press "Spacebar" to Jump

You can double jump...

...and the color of those irises are random and dynamic. Yeah, nothing specially nice as well huhu. ;(

Made in around two hours total.
